        public boolean gotError()

      • error

        public void error(java.lang.String message,
                  @Nullable
                  java.lang.Exception e)
        Description copied from interface: ErrorHandler
        Called when a fatal error occurred that definitely prevented the camera form working in a way that is visible to the user. The end user should be notified gracefully and the camera session might need to be restarted.
        Specified by:
        error in interface ErrorHandler
        Parameters:
        message - the error message
        e - the Exception that was thrown (if any)

      • warning

        public void warning(java.lang.String message)
        Description copied from interface: ErrorHandler
        Called when we suspect that the user might have made a mistake or when minor error occurred that might alter the behavior of the camera.
        Specified by:
        warning in interface ErrorHandler
        Parameters:
        message - the error message

      • info

        public void info(java.lang.String message)
        Description copied from interface: ErrorHandler
        Called throughout the Camera3 code for debugging. This should probably be ignored.
        Specified by:
        info in interface ErrorHandler
        Parameters:
        message - the info message
